page.title: 20A Typical Monday at School
page.content: On a Monday morning I get to school just before 9a.m as usual. The whistle goes and we go into school, hang up our coats and bags, change our shoes & go into the classroom. Our teacher does the dinner register then we give in our Â£2.25 dinner money and read until it's time for P.E. which we do on the field or in the hall. After PE we go out to play for ten minutes. When the whistle is blown we go into school and do maths until dinner time. A typical dinner is ravioli, chips, peas and carrots followed by treacle pudding & custard. Then we play out on the field if the weather is nice or on the playground until the whistle goes. During the afternoon we work on a project such as 'Communications' with a break of ten minutes in the middle. We clear up the classroom before we go home at half past three.
